fields.name: Celebrate New Year In Paris: A 3-Night, 4-Day Tour From London
fields.value: • We will charge a cancellation fee of 100% if booking is cancelled 1 day or less before the event
fields.description:
Celebrate New Year in Paris - 3 Nights, 4 Days Tour

Embark on a mesmerizing journey through the enchanting cities of London, Amsterdam, Brussels, and Paris with our "Celebrate New Year in Paris" tour. This carefully crafted itinerary spans over 3 nights and 4 days, promising an immersive experience filled with iconic landmarks, cultural exploration, and a spectacular New Year's celebration.

 

Day-1 (29-12-23) Friday: London to Amsterdam

The adventure begins as you join your coach in London and set forth towards Dover, where you'll embark on a ferry crossing to Calais. From there, the journey continues to the picturesque city of Amsterdam. Upon arrival, a delightful one-hour canal cruise offers a glimpse of the city's charm. Check into your 3/4-star hotel for a comfortable overnight stay in Amsterdam.

 

Day-2 (30-12-23) Saturday: Amsterdam to Brussels

Start the day with a hearty breakfast before venturing to Zans village, known for its iconic windmills, wooden houses, and a cheese factory. Later, proceed to Brussels, where the futuristic Atomium awaits your exploration. An orientation city tour introduces you to the beauty of Grand Place and the whimsical Manneken Pis. Check into your hotel for an overnight stay in Brussels.

 

Day-3 (31-12-23) Sunday: Brussels to Paris - New Year's Eve Celebration

After breakfast, journey towards the city of love, Paris. Experience the magic of the Eiffel Tower with a visit to its 2nd level and an enchanting orientation city tour. As the day unfolds, anticipation builds for the highlight of the tour - celebrating New Year 2024 amidst the glittering lights of the Eiffel Tower. Return to your hotel for an overnight stay in Paris.

 

Day-4 (01-01-2024) Monday: Paris to London

Begin the day with breakfast, followed by a Seine River Cruise offering stunning views of Paris. The tour concludes as you head back to London, leaving behind a trail of unforgettable memories. Departure is scheduled for approximately 10:30 PM, marking the end of an extraordinary journey.

 

Indulge in the richness of European culture, marvel at architectural wonders, and ring in the New Year with unparalleled elegance on the "Celebrate New Year in Paris" tour. Join us for an adventure that promises to be the perfect start to a memorable 2024.

fields.name: Capri Island Day Trip From Rome
fields.value: • We will charge a cancellation fee of 100% if the booking is canceled 1 day or less before the event
fields.description:
What makes this tour unique?
  • Delicate a full day of the wonders of Capri Island
  • A day at the Capris Beach
  • A walk in the center of Ana Capri.
  • A walk to Tagara from Piazzetta.
  • A climb up Mount Solaro with the chair lift from Piazza Vittoria. (Self)
  • A boat tour around the island and the Blue Grotto. (Self)
Itinerary:
7:00    – (ROME) Process for Rome to Capri
10:00  – (NAPOLI) After reaching Napoli, we will go to the most beautiful Capri Island using a cruise
11:30  – (CAPRI) After a five hour journey we will reach Capri Island
5:15    – Process from Capri to Napoli by Cruise
6:30    – Back to Rome from Napoli by Bus
9:30    – Come back to ROME
 
Cost Includes:
  • Transport (Rome - Napoli - Rome)
  • Cruise ( Napoli - Capri - Napoli)
  • Breakfast (Coffee & Croissants)
  • Lunch (Club Sandwich, Fruits & Water)
  • Sightseeing (Outside)
What to Bring:
  • Comfortable shoes
  • Sunglasses
  • Sun hat
Not Allowed:
  • Not allowed taking food on transport.
  • Pets
  • Luggage or Large bag

fields.name: Rome: Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hills Ticket with Hosted Entry
fields.value: • You are eligible for a full refund if you cancel up to 7 days before the tour.
fields.description:
Experience the wonders of ancient Rome with priority access to the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill. Skip the long ticket lines by getting your tickets in advance and enjoy hosted entry to the Colosseum.

 

Why Choose Our Entry Pass?

By booking Colosseum tickets with us, you receive e-tickets directly to your email and WhatsApp, allowing you to skip the long ticket lines. Avoid the hassle of purchasing tickets on-site and simply follow the security line. After a quick security check, you're ready to begin your journey through Rome's most famous ancient sites.

 

Tour Highlights

Priority Access: Skip the ticket line and head straight to the security check.

Hosted Entry: Our host will guide you through the entry process, ensuring a smooth and stress-free start to your visit.

Comprehensive Access: Enjoy entry to the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill with a single pass.

Flexible Validity: While your entry pass is valid for 24 hours, allowing you to explore the Roman Forum and Palatine Hill at your leisure, please note that your Colosseum entry time is fixed and must be adhered to as per the time slot you selected during booking.

Convenient E-Tickets: Receive your tickets via email and WhatsApp for a seamless experience.

 

Book Your Colosseum Tickets Today

Secure your Colosseum tickets now and enjoy a seamless, self-guided tour of Rome’s ancient treasures. Skip the ticket line, save time, and delve into the rich history of the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill. Book with us for an unforgettable Roman adventure!
fields.additional_info:
• Confirmation: You will receive a confirmation at the time of booking.
  • Traveler Information: Please provide the full names of all travelers when booking. Failure to present a voucher with all travelers ' full names at the box office may result in denied entry to the Colosseum and Roman Forum.
  • Entry Validity: The entry pass will be invalid 15 minutes after the designated entry time. For successful entry to the Colosseum and Roman Forum, each traveler must present a valid passport or ID document that matches the name provided at the time of booking.
  • Arrival Time: Please arrive at the Colosseum entrance 15 minutes before your scheduled entry time.
  • Security Check: Despite having priority access, all visitors must follow the queue for the security check.
  • Child Entry Pass: To redeem the child entry pass (for those under 18), you must show a valid photo ID.
  • Refund Window: This experience is non-refundable and cannot be changed for any reason. If you cancel or ask for an amendment, the amount you paid will not be refunded.
  • Participant Suitability: Most travelers can participate.
fields.knw_before_go:
• Duration: 3 hours
  • Mobile tickets accepted
  • Instant confirmation
  • Confirmation will be received at the time of booking.
  • Wheelchair accessible.
  • Stroller accessible.
  • Conveniently located near public transportation.
  • Infants must sit on laps.
  • Not recommended for travelers with back problems.
  • Not recommended for pregnant travelers.
  • Not suitable for individuals with heart problems
  • Suitable for most travelers.
fields.inclution:
• Entry to the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill (Must Follow The Security Line)
  • Hosted entry
  • 24-hour validity for the entire visit
  • Colosseum entry pass
  • Colosseum reservation fee

 

Please Note: The fees mentioned above specifically cover entry to the Colosseum. The remaining cost of this experience includes additional services provided.
fields.exclusion:
Any Transportation.
Any optional tips you pay.
No Guide is included.

fields.name: Germany
fields.value:
Discover Germany's Best with Dream Tourism


Come along on a wonderful journey through Germany with Dream Tourism, where every place is
like a fantastic story.


Berlin and Brandenburg Gate Wonders:
Explore Berlin with Dream Tourism. See the cool Brandenburg Gate and more. Our tours show you
interesting things in museums and guide you through nice neighborhoods in Berlin.


Bavarian Castle Adventure:
Visit amazing castles in Bavaria with Dream Tourism. There's the big Neuschwanstein Castle and
the charming Hohenzollern Castle. Our tours make it feel like you're in a fairy tale.


Rhine Valley Beauty:
Experience the beauty of the Rhine Valley with Dream Tourism. We show you more than just pretty
landscapes – explore cute villages and nice vineyards, capturing the charm of this lovely region.

fields.name: Netherlands
fields.value:
Discover the Charm of the Netherlands with Dream Tourism


Come along on a fantastic journey through the Netherlands with us, where every place is like stepping into a wonderful story.


Amsterdam Canals Adventure:
Explore the beauty of Amsterdam with Dream Tourism. Sail through the pretty canals and discover more hidden gems. Our tours take you to interesting places and stroll with you through the lovely neighborhoods of Amsterdam.


Keukenhof Gardens Marvel:
Immerse yourself in the breathtaking Keukenhof Gardens with Dream Tourism. Picture endless fields of vibrant flowers, especially the iconic tulips. Our tours make it feel like you're wandering through a mesmerizing floral wonderland.


Windmills in Kinderdijk:
Experience the allure of Kinderdijk's windmills with Dream Tourism. Wander among the historic windmills and listen to their fascinating stories. Our tours turn your visit into an exciting journey through the ingenuity of Dutch engineering.

fields.name: Switzerland
fields.value:
Discover the Beauty of Switzerland with Dream Tourism


Join the wonderful journey through Switzerland with Dream Tourism, where every place is like a picture from a storybook.


Swiss Alps Adventure:
Explore the magnificent Swiss Alps with Dream Tourism. Behold the tall, snowy mountains and more. Our tours take you to fascinating spots and guide you through charming towns nestled in the embrace of the Swiss Alps.

 

Lucerne Lakeside Serenity:
Visit the enchanting lakeside in Lucerne with Dream Tourism. Surrounded by majestic mountains, it's a serene and picturesque setting. Our tours make it feel like you've stepped into a tranquil and beautiful landscape.


Zurich City Delights:
Experience the vibrant charm of Zurich city with Dream Tourism. Explore intriguing places and soak in the friendly atmosphere. Our tours turn your visit into a delightful journey, immersing you in the rich culture of Switzerland.

fields.name: France
fields.value:
Explore France's Best with Dream Tourism


Discover amazing places in France with Dream Tourism, where each spot is like a storybook.


Paris and Eiffel Tower Magic:
Witness the iconic Eiffel Tower with Dream Tourism. Our tours go beyond the tower, revealing the
artistic wonders of the Louvre and guiding you through the charming streets of Montmartre in Paris.


Loire Valley Castles Adventure:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting castles of the Loire Valley with Dream Tourism. Explore the
grand Château de Chambord and the charming Château de Chenonceau, each with its unique
tales. Our tours turn your visit into a fairy-tale experience.


Provence's Picturesque Fields:
Experience the beauty of Provence with Dream Tourism. Beyond lavender fields, our tours lead you
through quaint villages and scenic vineyards, capturing the essence of this picturesque region.

fields.name: Italy
fields.value:
Explore Italy's Best with Dream Tourism


Join us on a captivating journey through Italy's rich history and culture.


Colosseum Adventure:

Discover the famous Colosseum with Dream Tourism. Our expert guides make history come alive,
sharing stories of gladiators and the grandeur of ancient Rome. Marvel at this incredible building
that stood strong through centuries, showcasing the power of the mighty Roman Empire.


Vatican Treasures:

Dive into the cultural and spiritual wonders of the Vatican City. From the amazing St. Peter's Basilica
to the timeless art of the Sistine Chapel, each moment is a piece of living history. Let our guides
make your visit informative and fascinating.


Paris Romance Getaway:
Fall in love with Paris through Dream Tourism. Our special tours go beyond the Eiffel Tower, guiding
you through the artistic treasures of the Louvre and the charming streets of Montmartre. Explore the
city's love for art, culture, and delicious food as you wander through its enchanting neighborhoods.

fields.name: Belgium
fields.value:
Explore Belgium's Best with Dream Tourism


Join us on a delightful journey through Belgium's history and culture.


Brussels' Grand Square Adventure:
Discover the beauty of Brussels' Grand Place with Dream Tourism. Our friendly guides share the
stories behind the stunning architecture of this UNESCO site, revealing centuries of history in the
heart of the city.


Medieval Charm in Bruges:
Immerse yourself in Bruges' medieval magic. Our guided tours ensure you experience the
fairytale-like atmosphere, from the iconic Belfry to the charming cobblestone streets, capturing the
essence of this Belgian gem.


Antwerp's Diamond District Delights:
Experience the lively Diamond District in Antwerp with Dream Tourism. Beyond diamonds, explore
cultural gems like the Cathedral of Our Lady and the Royal Museum of Fine Arts, making your visit
to Antwerp truly memorable.

fields.name: United States
fields.value:
Discover the Wonders of the United States with Dream Tourism


Join the exciting journey through the United States with Dream Tourism, where every place is like a chapter from an adventure book.


New York City Excitement:
Dive into the lively streets of New York City with Dream Tourism. Witness the towering skyscrapers and more. Our tours take you to fascinating spots and guide you through the vibrant neighborhoods of this bustling metropolis.


Grand Canyon Majesty:
Experience the awe-inspiring Grand Canyon with Dream Tourism. Marvel at the gigantic canyon adorned with colorful rocks. Our tours make it feel like you're standing on the edge of a breathtaking natural wonder.


Disney Magic in Orlando:
Discover the enchanting world of Disney in Orlando with Dream Tourism. Explore the magical theme parks and have a blast. Our tours turn your visit into a joyful journey through the captivating wonders of Disney.

fields.name: Valentine's Day In Venice And Bernina Express Journey To Switzerland
fields.value: • We will charge a cancellation fee of 100% if the booking is canceled 1 day or less before the event
fields.description:
Join us on a Love-Filled Odyssey: 3-Night, 4-Day Valentine's Retreat

 

Are you ready to elevate your Valentine's Day celebration to an extraordinary level? Join us on a meticulously crafted 3-night, 4-day journey, carefully designed to encapsulate the essence of romance, cultural richness, and breathtaking landscapes. Here's why you don't want to miss this unforgettable experience:

 

1. London's Romantic Prelude:

  • Captivating Atmosphere: Begin your love-filled escapade in the heart of London, where the air is tinged with romance, setting the perfect tone for your enchanting journey.

 

2. Venetian Charms Unveiled:

  • Timeless Beauty: Immerse yourself in the allure of Venice, where every cobblestone street and canal evokes timeless romance.
  • Curated Culinary Experience: Indulge in an exquisitely curated Valentine's dinner on a private island, creating a memory that will linger as one of the most romantic moments of your life.

 

3. Swiss Alps by Bernina Express:

  • Breathtaking Landscapes: Traverse the Swiss Alps aboard the Bernina Express, a journey offering panoramic views that will leave you breathless.
  • Charming Swiss Towns: Explore charming Swiss towns, including Interlaken, Lauterbrunnen, and Meiringen, creating a picturesque backdrop for your love story.
  • Cinematic Allure: Step into the James Bond 007 world in Grindelwald, adding a touch of cinematic allure to your adventure.

 

4. Cultural Sojourn in Luzern:

  • Historical Richness: Immerse yourself in the historical richness of Luzern, where cobbled streets and medieval architecture transport you to another era.
  • Curated City Tour: Experience a curated city tour, offering a nuanced appreciation of Luzern's cultural tapestry.

 

5. Crafting Moments of Love:

  • Meticulous Design: Every detail of this tour is meticulously designed to create an atmosphere where love flourishes and unforgettable memories are crafted.

 

6. A Celebration of Romance:

  • Intimate Moments: Whether it's a quiet gondola ride in Venice, the panoramic views from the Bernina Express, or the cultural immersion in Luzern, each experience is a celebration of love.

 

7. Souvenirs of Timeless Love:

  • Cherished Memories: As the tour concludes with a flight from Milan back to London, carry not just souvenirs but a collection of moments that transcend time—a celebration of love that lingers like a cherished melody.

 

Join us on this extraordinary journey, where every detail has been thoughtfully curated to make your Valentine's celebration an experience that surpasses all expectations. Seize the opportunity to create lasting memories, strengthen bonds, and celebrate love in a way that goes beyond the ordinary. Book your place now for an enchanting 3-night, 4-day Valentine's retreat that promises to be a highlight in your love story.

fields.name: Tulip Garden Tour From London By Eurostar
fields.value: • We will charge a cancellation fee of 100% if the booking is canceled 1 day or less before the event
fields.description:
Step into a world where romance blooms amidst the vibrant tulip gardens on our 3-day Eurostar Tulip Adventure from London to Brussels and Amsterdam. This enchanting journey is meticulously crafted to immerse you and your loved one in the timeless beauty of blooming tulips, picturesque landscapes, and intimate moments.

 

Day 1: Embrace the Beginning of Love

 

Your romantic sojourn begins with a Eurostar journey from London to Brussels, setting the tone for an unforgettable escape. Arriving at Brussels Central station, you'll be whisked away on an orientation city tour, a perfect prelude to the romantic escapades ahead. The iconic Atomium beckons, a symbol of futuristic love that sets the stage for the enchantment awaiting you in Amsterdam. As the day unfolds, an intimate dinner at an Indian restaurant provides the perfect setting to savor each other's company.

 

Overnight: Find solace in the comfort of your Amsterdam hotel, setting the stage for dreamy nights.

 

Day 2: Romance in Full Bloom

 

Awaken to the promise of a day filled with love and blooms. After a leisurely breakfast at the hotel, you'll be transported to the magical Keukenhof Tulip Garden. Lose yourselves in a kaleidoscope of colors, strolling hand in hand amid nature's romantic masterpiece. The romance continues with an Amsterdam canal cruise, where the city's charm is reflected in the gentle ripples of its waterways. As evening descends, an intimate dinner at an Indian restaurant awaits, creating a culinary symphony for two.

 

Overnight: Allow the magic of Amsterdam to weave its spell on your hearts as you retire to your cozy haven.

Day 3: Zaanse Schans Bliss

 

Conclude your Eurostar Tulip Adventure with a visit to Zaanse Schans—a timeless windmill village where love blossoms amid historic charm. Stroll hand in hand, discovering wooden shoe artistry and cheese craftsmanship. Each moment whispers love against the picturesque backdrop. As your romantic journey returns to Brussels in the afternoon, aboard the Eurostar, cherish the echoes of shared laughter, the heartbeat of your love story woven through this tulip-filled escapade.

  • Cinematic Allure: Step into the James Bond 007 world in Grindelwald, adding a touch of cinematic allure to your adventure.

 

4. Cultural Sojourn in Luzern:

  • Historical Richness: Immerse yourself in the historical richness of Luzern, where cobbled streets and medieval architecture transport you to another era.
  • Curated City Tour: Experience a curated city tour, offering a nuanced appreciation of Luzern's cultural tapestry.

 

5. Crafting Moments of Love:

  • Meticulous Design: Every detail of this tour is meticulously designed to create an atmosphere where love flourishes and unforgettable memories are crafted.

 

6. A Celebration of Romance:

  • Intimate Moments: Whether it's a quiet gondola ride in Venice, the panoramic views from the Bernina Express, or the cultural immersion in Luzern, each experience is a celebration of love.

 

7. Souvenirs of Timeless Love:

  • Cherished Memories: As the tour concludes with a flight from Milan back to London, carry not just souvenirs but a collection of moments that transcend time—a celebration of love that lingers like a cherished melody.

 

Join us on this extraordinary journey, where every detail has been thoughtfully curated to make your Valentine's celebration an experience that surpasses all expectations. Seize the opportunity to create lasting memories, strengthen bonds, and celebrate love in a way that goes beyond the ordinary. Book your place now for an enchanting 3-night, 4-day Valentine's retreat that promises to be a highlight in your love story.

fields.name: Tulip Garden Tour From London By Eurostar
fields.value: Tulip Garden Tour From London By Eurostar
fields.description:
Step into a world where romance blooms amidst the vibrant tulip gardens on our 3-day Eurostar Tulip Adventure from London to Brussels and Amsterdam. This enchanting journey is meticulously crafted to immerse you and your loved one in the timeless beauty of blooming tulips, picturesque landscapes, and intimate moments.

 

Day 1: Embrace the Beginning of Love

 

Your romantic sojourn begins with a Eurostar journey from London to Brussels, setting the tone for an unforgettable escape. Arriving at Brussels Central station, you'll be whisked away on an orientation city tour, a perfect prelude to the romantic escapades ahead. The iconic Atomium beckons, a symbol of futuristic love that sets the stage for the enchantment awaiting you in Amsterdam. As the day unfolds, an intimate dinner at an Indian restaurant provides the perfect setting to savor each other's company.

 

Overnight: Find solace in the comfort of your Amsterdam hotel, setting the stage for dreamy nights.

 

Day 2: Romance in Full Bloom

 

Awaken to the promise of a day filled with love and blooms. After a leisurely breakfast at the hotel, you'll be transported to the magical Keukenhof Tulip Garden. Lose yourselves in a kaleidoscope of colors, strolling hand in hand amid nature's romantic masterpiece. The romance continues with an Amsterdam canal cruise, where the city's charm is reflected in the gentle ripples of its waterways. As evening descends, an intimate dinner at an Indian restaurant awaits, creating a culinary symphony for two.

 

Overnight: Allow the magic of Amsterdam to weave its spell on your hearts as you retire to your cozy haven.

Day 3: Zaanse Schans Bliss

 

Conclude your Eurostar Tulip Adventure with a visit to Zaanse Schans—a timeless windmill village where love blossoms amid historic charm. Stroll hand in hand, discovering wooden shoe artistry and cheese craftsmanship. Each moment whispers love against the picturesque backdrop. As your romantic journey returns to Brussels in the afternoon, aboard the Eurostar, cherish the echoes of shared laughter, the heartbeat of your love story woven through this tulip-filled escapade.
fields.inclution:
• Luxury Hotel For 2 Nights.
  • Hi-Deluxe Bus.
  • Breakfast & Dinner.
  • Tulip Garden Entry Ticket.
  • Amsterdam Cannel Cruise Ticket.
fields.exclusion: • Lunch and Other Personal Expenses.

fields.name: Visit Europe In Summer Holiday: Switzerland, Venice, Austria And Liechtenstein
fields.value: • We will charge a cancellation fee of 100% if the booking is canceled 15 days or less before the event
fields.description:
Day-1: Journey from London to Venice and Venice Island Walking Tour 4 Hours

Walking through Venice is a unique and enchanting experience. Venice can get quite crowded, so starting your walk early in the morning can help you enjoy the city's beauty without the rush of tourists. The streets and alleys of Venice are primarily cobblestone, so comfortable walking shoes are a must.

 

Day-2: Innsbruck City Tour and Vaduz City Tour

Innsbruck city tour can give you a wonderful glimpse into the charm and history of this beautiful Austrian city. A short walk from the Golden Roof, visit the Hofkirche (Court Church) and see the elaborate tomb of Emperor Maximilian I surrounded by 28 bronze statues. Then, head over to the nearby Imperial Palace, one of the most significant cultural buildings in Austria

Vaduz, the capital of Liechtenstein, is a small but charming city with a rich cultural and historical heritage. Vaduz Castle, the official residence of the Prince of Liechtenstein. While the castle itself is not open to the public. we can enjoy a walk up to it and take in the stunning panoramic views of the city and the Rhine Valley. Just a short walk away is the Liechtenstein National Museum. This museum offers an excellent overview of the country’s history, culture, and natural history

 

Day-3: Zurich Rhine Falls Visit and Interlaken City Tour 

Visiting the Rhine Falls in Zurich can be an exhilarating experience. Visit the castle, which offers panoramic views of the falls. Required tickets for access to the viewing platforms. Walk down to the various viewing platforms. They provide different perspectives and breathtaking views of the falls. The Känzeli platform, which offers one of the closest views. The boat ride lasts around 30 minutes and gives you a unique perspective from the water

Walking is the best way to get around Interlaken given the short distance between most attractions. Accessed via funicular from Interlaken Ost. Take the funicular from Interlaken Ost up to Harder Kulm, which offers breathtaking panoramic views of Interlaken, Lake Thun, and Lake Brienz, as well as the Jungfrau region. The ride itself is quick, around 10 minutes each way, leaving you ample time to soak in the scenery from the viewing platform at the top.

 

Day-4: Lauterbrunnen, Grindelwald Visit and back to London

Top Attractions:

First Cliff Walk: A thrilling cliffside walkway with spectacular views and a glass-bottom lookout point.

Bachalpsee Lake: A beautiful alpine lake accessible by a moderate hike from the First gondola station.

Eiger Trail: A hiking path that runs along the foot of the Eiger's North Face, offering close-up views of this famous mountain.

Grindelwald Glacier Canyon: A dramatic gorge with walkways and a spiderweb net for adventurous visitors.

  • A day at the capris beach
  • A walk in the center of Ana Capri.
  • A walk to Tagara from Piazzetta.

fields.name: Switzerland by Bernina Express & Visit Milan Lake Como
fields.value: • We will charge a cancellation fee of 100% if the booking is canceled 16 days or less before the event
fields.description:
Day-01: Travel from London to Milan

Catch a flight from London to Milan. Then explore the beautiful city of Milan, known for its fashion, architecture, and rich history. Head to Lake Como, a stunning lake surrounded by picturesque towns and lush green mountains. You can enjoy a leisurely stroll along the lake, take a boat ride, or visit nearby villages like Bellagio or Varenna. End your day with a delicious halal dinner at one of Milan's many restaurants offering diverse cuisines. After dinner, you will return to your hotel in Milan for an overnight stay, resting up for the adventures ahead.

 

Day-02: Travel to Switzerland

 

Start your day with a hearty breakfast at hotel. Enjoy a scenic journey on the Bernina Express, one of the most beautiful train routes in the world, as we travel from Italy to Switzerland. Discover the charm of Lucerne with an orientation tour. Highlights might include the Chapel Bridge, Lion Monument, and the beautiful lake views. Continue to Zurich and explore the city's main attractions, such as Bahnhofstrasse, the Old Town (Altstadt), and the serene Zurich Lake. At evening enjoy a delicious halal dinner at a local restaurant in Zurich.

Rest and recharge at your hotel in Zurich for the night.

This sounds like a fantastic day of exploring some of Switzerland's most picturesque cities by luxurious bus!

 

Day-03: Explore Interlaken, Grindelwald & Lauterbrunnen

 Start your day with a hearty breakfast at your hotel to fuel up for the adventures ahead. Begin your exploration in Interlaken, a beautiful town nestled between Lake Thun and Lake Brienz. You can stroll through the town by luxurious bus, enjoy the scenic views, and perhaps do some shopping or visit a local café. Next, head over to Grindelwald, a charming mountain village surrounded by the stunning Bernese Alps. We can take a cable car ride to First for breathtaking panoramic views, go for a hike, or simply enjoy the picturesque scenery. After Grindelwald, make your way to Lauterbrunnen. Known for its dramatic valley and numerous waterfalls, Lauterbrunnen is perfect for a leisurely walk or a visit to the famous Staubbach Falls. You can also explore the Trümmelbach Falls, a series of waterfalls inside the mountain. For dinner, there are several halal restaurants in Interlaken, Grindelwald, or Lauterbrunnen, offering a variety of cuisines. Make sure to plan ahead to ensure a smooth dining experience. After a day of exploring by luxurious bus, head back to Zurich for an overnight stay. It's about a 2-hour drive from Lauterbrunnen to Zurich, so you'll have enough time to relax and unwind before the next day.

 

Day-04: Milan to London

Start your day with a hearty breakfast at your hotel in Zurich.

Depart from your hotel and head towards Rhine Falls, one of Europe's largest waterfalls, located about 45 minutes from Zurich by luxurious bus. Spend a few hours enjoying the breathtaking views and exploring the area. You can take a boat trip to the falls or walk along the trails for various viewpoints. Enjoy lunch near Rhine Falls before heading back to Zurich. There are several restaurants and cafes with scenic views of the falls. After visiting Rhine Falls, return to Zurich and prepare for your journey to Milan. We will travel by luxurious bus, which typically takes about 3-4 hours. From Milan, catch a flight to London. The flight is approximately 2 hours. Be sure to arrive at the airport in Milan with ample time for check-in and security. Upon arriving in London, proceed to your accommodation and check-in.

fields.name: Glamorous Iceland
fields.value:
Cancel more than 30 days before departure: Full refund

Cancel 15-30 days before departure: 75% refund

Cancel within 15 days: No refund
fields.description:
Discover Iceland’s extraordinary landscapes, rich culture, and natural beauty on this carefully planned 6-day journey. From majestic waterfalls and glaciers to soothing geothermal waters, each day promises unforgettable moments.

 

Day 1: Arrive in Reykjavik, where your guide will greet you with a warm welcome. Explore the city’s highlights, including iconic landmarks and the immersive FlyOver Iceland experience. Check in to your hotel and enjoy a delicious Indian dinner.

 

Day 2: Visit the Golden Circle’s must-see sites, from geysers and waterfalls to the stunning landscapes of the South Coast. Walk along black sand beaches and marvel at cascading waterfalls. End the day with dinner and an overnight stay in Vik.

 

Day 3: Discover Jokulsarlon Glacier Lagoon, where icebergs float serenely, and stroll along the shimmering Diamond Beach. Explore Skaftafell National Park or visit the famous plane wreck site. Enjoy dinner and an overnight stay in Hofn.

 

Day 4: Journey through lava fields, volcanic craters, and picturesque fishing villages. Visit waterfalls and admire the dramatic landscapes before returning to Reykjavik for dinner and a restful night.

 

Day 5: Spend your day unwinding at the Blue Lagoon, soaking in its therapeutic geothermal waters. Later, enjoy free time to explore Reykjavik’s vibrant streets.

 

Day 6: After breakfast, transfer to the airport with cherished memories of Iceland’s breathtaking beauty and serene landscapes.
fields.knw_before_go:
Duration: 6 days 5 nights

Price per person based on 2/3 adults  sharing a room 

Child 2-11 years must share a room  with 2/3 adults 

Max occupancy per room is 3 person

Single supplement will be an  additional per night £60 (hotel)

fields.name: Scandinavian Cruise & Amsterdam Tulip Garden Tour
fields.value:
Cancel more than 30 days before departure: Full refund

Cancel 15-30 days before departure: 75% refund

Cancel within 15 days: No refund
fields.description:
Experience the charm of Europe with a carefully planned 4-day trip, filled with picturesque views, cultural landmarks, and tranquil gardens.

 

Day 1: Fly from London to Oslo, Norway, and take a round-trip boat cruise to Verdens Ende, a serene recreational spot at the west coast of Oslofjorden. Enjoy sweeping views of the sea to the east and south and a peaceful visit to the nearby lake. Return to Oslo, a city that beautifully combines Viking heritage with modern architecture. End the day with dinner and an overnight stay in Oslo.

 

Day 2: Spend the morning exploring Oslo, including Vigeland Sculpture Park with over 200 sculptures reflecting human life, the Royal Palace from the 19th century, and the medieval Akershus Fortress overlooking the Oslofjord. In the afternoon, board a cruise to Copenhagen. Enjoy dinner on the ship while taking in scenic coastal views, followed by an overnight stay onboard.

 

Day 3: Arrive in Copenhagen and explore the vibrant Nyhavn harbor, lined with colorful buildings and historic ships. Visit the Little Mermaid Statue, inspired by Hans Christian Andersen, and enjoy the atmosphere of Tivoli Gardens, a historic amusement park. Fly to Amsterdam for an overnight stay.

 

Day 4: Visit Keukenhof Gardens in the Netherlands, known for its beautiful tulip displays. Take a canal cruise in Amsterdam, admiring its historic bridges and townhouses. Return to London, bringing home memories of a delightful European journey.

fields.name: Turkey Istanbul
fields.value:
Cancel more than 30 days before departure: Full refund

Cancel 15-30 days before departure: 75% refund

Cancel within 15 days: No refund
fields.description:
Discover the enchanting city of Istanbul with this 4-day itinerary that blends history, culture, and scenic beauty. From the Bosphorus River Cruise to exploring iconic landmarks and vibrant markets, experience the best of Istanbul before continuing your journey across Europe.

 

Day 1: Arrive in Istanbul and check into your hotel. Begin your adventure with a Bosphorus River Cruise, offering panoramic views of Istanbul’s skyline. See famous landmarks such as Dolmabahçe Palace and Galata Tower as the city’s lights twinkle in the evening. Enjoy a delicious dinner onboard, complemented by an energetic belly dance performance showcasing Turkish culture.

 

Day 2: Start your day with a visit to Hagia Sophia, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, where you can admire its stunning mosaics and impressive dome. Next, explore the Blue Mosque, known for its intricate blue Iznik tiles and stunning architecture. Finish the day at the Spice Bazaar, a lively market filled with aromatic spices, Turkish delights, and colorful souvenirs.

 

Day 3: Visit the Istanbul Museum to experience centuries of Turkish art and history. Afterward, dive into a shopping spree at the Grand Bazaar, one of the oldest and largest covered markets in the world. With over 4,000 shops, you can find everything from jewelry to carpets. End the day with a peaceful walk through Gülhane Park, a green oasis offering scenic views of the Bosphorus.

 

Day 4: Enjoy a relaxed morning, taking time to explore Istanbul at your own pace. Visit local shops, cafes, or simply enjoy the city’s charm before preparing for your departure. Head to London, with additional stops in Paris, Disneyland Paris, the Netherlands, and Belgium for more exciting adventures.

fields.name: Venice and Switzerland by Bernina Express
fields.value:
Cancel more than 30 days before departure: Full refund

Cancel 15-30 days before departure: 75% refund

Cancel within 15 days: No refund
fields.description:
Get ready for an unforgettable journey through the magical canals of Venice and the breathtaking Alps of Switzerland! This 5-day trip is perfect for anyone who loves culture, nature, and a touch of luxury. From gondolas to glaciers, every moment is designed to leave you in awe.

 

Day 1: Begin your adventure with a morning flight from London to Milan. After a warm welcome and a delightful breakfast, explore the iconic canals and landmarks of Venice. Conclude your day with a delicious dinner and an overnight stay in Milan.

 

Day 2: Board the scenic Bernina Express to Switzerland, marveling at the stunning views of the Alps. Spend 2-3 hours exploring the glamorous resort town of St. Moritz before heading to Zurich for dinner and a restful night.

 

Day 3: Discover the Alpine wonders of Interlaken, Grindelwald, and Lauterbrunnen, home to serene lakes and 72 cascading waterfalls. Take in the breathtaking mountain scenery before returning to Zurich for dinner and an overnight stay.

 

Day 4: Visit the majestic Rhine Falls and enjoy boat rides amid Europe’s largest waterfall. Explore Lucerne’s charming old town, Chapel Bridge, and Lion Monument before another night in Zurich.

 

Day 5: End your adventure with a visit to Mount Titlis, where you’ll experience thrilling glacier views and panoramic landscapes. Return to Zurich and fly back to London, cherishing memories of your Swiss escape.

fields.description:
Discover the beauty of Norway on this 4-day journey, where you’ll explore scenic landscapes, charming villages, and rich cultural history. From the stunning views at Verdens Ende to the peaceful fjords of Flam, this trip offers a perfect balance of nature and heritage. Whether you're admiring Oslo's landmarks or cruising through tranquil fjords, each day brings a new adventure that will leave you with unforgettable memories.

 

Day 1: Arrive in Oslo and travel to Verdens Ende, a peaceful location offering wide views of the Oslofjorden. Spend time exploring the area and taking in the serene surroundings before returning to Oslo for a comfortable overnight stay.

 

Day 2: Start the day by visiting Oslo’s top attractions, including the Vigeland Sculpture Park and the Royal Palace. In the afternoon, take a scenic trip to Flam, a picturesque village located in the heart of Norway’s fjord country. Settle in for a relaxing evening in Flam, ready to explore more of the area.

 

Day 3: Spend the day in Flam, surrounded by towering mountains and deep fjords. Enjoy a peaceful cruise through the Flam fjord, where you’ll experience the stunning beauty of the landscape and waterfalls. Return to Flam for a quiet evening.

 

Day 4: On the final day, visit one of Norway’s famous waterfalls before heading back to Oslo. After taking in the natural beauty, fly back to London, carrying with you lasting memories of your time in Norway.
fields.additional_info:
Pack a European travel adapter to stay charged. 

Check your passport, visa, and travel documents for validity.

Secure travel insurance for peace of mind.

Bring a power bank and smartphone to stay connected.

Pack comfortable shoes for walking tours and exploring cities.

Dress in layered clothing to handle Europe’s changing weather.

Carry credit cards and some Euros for seamless transactions.
fields.knw_before_go:
Duration: 4 days 3 nights

Price per person based on 2/3 adults  sharing a room 

Child 2-11 years must share a room  with 2/3 adults 

Max occupancy per room is 3 person

Single supplement will be an  additional per night £60 (hotel)

fields.name: Disneyland Park Belgium, Netherlands & Paris Tour
fields.value:
Cancel more than 30 days before departure: Full refund

Cancel 15-30 days before departure: 75% refund

Cancel within 15 days: No refund
fields.description:
This 4-day journey takes you through some of Europe’s most iconic cities, from the charming canals of Amsterdam to the magic of Disneyland Paris, with stops in Brussels and the heart of Paris. Each day offers a blend of culture, history, and unforgettable experiences.

 

Day 1: Your adventure begins with a scenic river cruise through Amsterdam's historic canals, offering a unique view of the city. Then, visit Zaanse Schans, a picturesque village known for its traditional windmills and crafts. Enjoy a tasting of Dutch cheeses at a local factory before exploring the vibrant streets of Amsterdam on a guided walking tour.

 

Day 2: After breakfast, head to Brussels to admire the impressive Atomium, explore a historic castle, and stroll through the Grand Place while indulging in some delicious Belgian chocolates. Then, continue your journey to Paris, where the magic of the City of Lights awaits.

 

Day 3: Start your day with a guided walking tour of Paris, passing famous landmarks such as the Champs-Élysées and the Arc de Triomphe. In the afternoon, immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Disneyland Paris, where you can enjoy thrilling rides, meet beloved characters, and experience the magic.

 

Day 4: Your final day begins with a relaxing canal cruise along the Seine, offering beautiful views of the Parisian skyline. Then, visit the Eiffel Tower’s second stage for breathtaking panoramic views of the city. Conclude your journey as you return to London, filled with unforgettable memories from your European adventure.
